üí° Pro Tips

For immediate delivery: - Custom diagrams are your strongest visuals ‚úÖ - Live demos > screenshots (more engaging) - Speaker notes compensate for missing images - Participants won‚Äôt notice what‚Äôs not there

For logos: - Start with PhilSA, DOST, GEE (most visible) - PNG with transparent background preferred - At least 400x400px resolution

For testing: - Use browser developer tools (F12) to check image loads - Test on projector if possible - Have backup internet for live demos
